node.description:
Puncture can be charged up, causing Puncture with a melee weapon to deal damage in a larger area and causes Puncture with a bow to deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per second charged.

After 1 second it releases automatically.

nodeList.altText: If your maximum charge is 1 second, this will reduce the time it takes to reach maximum charge to 0.5 seconds, but you will still benefit as if you had charged for 1 second.
nodeList.description: If you use Puncture with a bow while you have a {Black Arrow}, Puncture charges 100% faster and blinds on hit.

node.description: Puncture deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per second charged.

Puncture can be charged up, causing Puncture with a melee weapon to deal damage in a larger area and causes Puncture with a bow to deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per second charged.

After 1 second it releases automatically.
Puncture deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but has less attack speed (multiplicative with other modifiers).
An extended melee stab or piercing bow attack that causes enemies to bleed.

nodeList.description: Instead of applying bleed, the greater Puncture consumes all stacks of bleed on the target, causing them to deal damage immediately and restoring health per stack consumed.

node.description: Every third Puncture deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and in a larger area.
